hours_text:
## Hours

**Museum Building  
**Nov. 1 – April 30: 10:00 a.m. – 4:00 p.m.  
May 1 – Oct. 31: 9:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m.

**Museum Store and Vesterheim Commons**  
All year: 9:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m.

**Heritage Park**  
Open daily to wander the grounds.  
May 1- Oct. 31: Guided tour of Heritage Park – Wed. through Sat., excluding holiday weekends. (Call ahead to confirm.)

Museum and Store are closed New Year’s Day, Easter, Thanksgiving, and Christmas.

## Admissions

**Adults:** $15  
**Ages 7-18:** $8  
**Seniors 65+:** $13

  * Second Saturday of the month: **FREE**
  * Museum Members: **FREE**
  * Luther College Students, Faculty, and Staff: **FREE**
  * [Museums for All:](https://vesterheim.org/museums-for-all-program/) **FREE** with EBT card (up to 4 people)
  * [Blue Star Museums Program:](https://bluestarfam.org/) FREE for active-duty military personnel, including the National Guard and Reserves, and their families annually from Armed Forces Day to Labor Day.

Vesterheim participates in three reciprocal networks, offering members of partner museums and institutions exclusive savings and admission benefits:

• [Time Travelers](https://timetravelers.mohistory.org/) members receive $1 off admission + 10% discount on eligible in-person Museum Store purchases  
• [NARM](https://narmassociation.org/) and [ROAM](https://sites.google.com/site/roammuseums/home/list-of-roam-museums) members enjoy free admission+ 10% discount on eligible in-person Museum Store purchases

Must show valid ...

#### [Folk Art School Classes](https://vesterheim.org/folk-art-school/)

Registration is open for classes through March 2026! Registration for classes from April-September 2026 opening February 20.

[Register Today!](https://vesterheim.org/folk-art-school/)

[](https://vesterheim.org/join-give/membership/)

#### [Become a Member](https://vesterheim.org/join-give/membership/)

There’s no better way to connect with the Vesterheim community, stay informed about opportunities, and support the museum!

[Join now](https://vesterheim.org/join-give/membership/)

[](https://vesterheim.org/programs/)

#### [Upcoming Events](https://vesterheim.org/programs/)

Find out what’s happening at Vesterheim – Free Second Saturday activities and more!

[View the Calendar!](https://vesterheim.org/programs/)

[](https://vesterheim.org/norway-tours/)

#### [Tours to Norway](https://vesterheim.org/norway-tours/)

Travel with Vesterheim – 2026 tour info available!

[Register Today](https://vesterheim.org/norway-tours/)

[](https://vesterheim.org/programs/200th-immigration-anniversary/)

#### [The 200th Anniversary of Norwegian Emigration](https://vesterheim.org/programs/200th-immigration-anniversary/)

Share the history and traditions of Norwegian Americans.

[Special programs, exhibitions, and classes](https://vesterheim.org/programs/200th-immigration-anniversary/)
